    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="fr">Une ombre triangulaire</string>
            <string language="en">A triangular shadow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein dreieckiger Schatten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma sombra triangular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'ombra triangolare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια τριγωνική σκιά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una sombra triangular</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre que les ombres sont formées suite à la propagation en ligne droite de la lumière. Ceci peut être utilisé dans un exercice où il faudrait ajouter une légende.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows shadows are formed due to the straight line propagation of light.  This can be used in a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Lampe</string>
            <string language="en">Lamp</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">écran</string>
            <string language="en">screen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ombre</string>
            <string language="en">shadow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vision</string>
            <string language="en">vision</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">triangle de  bois</string>
            <string language="en">wooden triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm stellt dar, daß Schatten an der 
geraden Geraden Ausbreitung des Lichtes gebildetes liegen. 
Dieses kann in einer beschriftenden Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que as sombras são  dado 
forma devido à linha reta propagação da luz. Isto pode ser 
usado em um exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra che le ombre sono formato 
dovuto la linea retta la propagazione di luce. Ciò può essere 
usata in un'esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει ότι οι σκιές 
διαμορφώνονται λόγω στη διάδοση ευθειών γραμμών του φωτός. 
Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que las sombras son formado
debido a la línea recta propagación de la luz. Esto se puede 
utilizar en un ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
